pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 一方は知っているが他方は知らない。
lessons.english: I know one of them but not the other.

lessons.japanese: 一方の本は薄い、他方は厚い、厚いのは約２００ページある。
lessons.english: One book is thin. The other is thick. The thick one has about 200 pages.

lessons.japanese: 一方に当てはまることは他方にも当てはまる。
lessons.english: What's sauce for the goose is sauce for the gander.

lessons.japanese: 一方で彼は私の報告書を賞賛したが、他方ではそれを批判した。
lessons.english: On one hand he praised my report, but on the other hand he criticized it.

lessons.japanese: 一方では彼は親切だが、他方では怠け者だ。
lessons.english: On one hand he is kind, but on the other hand he is lazy.

lessons.japanese: 他方でその経験から学んだものも大きかった。
lessons.english: On the other hand we learned a great deal from the experience.

lessons.japanese: どちらかが他方よりいい、というのではない。
lessons.english: One way is not better than the other.

lessons.japanese: その双子の一方を他方と見分けることができますか。
lessons.english: Can you tell one of the twins from the other?

lessons.japanese: その仕事はあまりおもしろくなかったが、他方で報酬が良かった。
lessons.english: That job was not very interesting, but on the other hand it was well paid.

lessons.japanese: 片方の本は薄く、他方は厚い。
lessons.english: One book is thin, and the other is thick.

lessons.japanese: 彼は有能な人だが、他方では、私たちに要求が多すぎる。
lessons.english: He is able man, but on the other hand he asks too much of us.

lessons.japanese: 彼は頭はよいが、他方ではしばしば軽率な間違いをする。
lessons.english: He is clever, but on the other hand he often makes careless mistakes.
